amendment.description: Amendment provides $1 million for a study on which U.S. coastal population centers are most at risk from the impacts of sea level rise due to global warming.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to designate funding for a Global Warming Study by the National Academy of Sciences.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Pallone.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
